hadiths.text: Aishah said:The Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) said to me; Get me the mat from the mosque. I said ; I am menstruating. The Messenger of Allah (May peace be upon him) then replied: Your menstruation is not in your hand

chapter.ara-name: باب فِي الْحَائِضِ تُنَاوِلُ مِنَ الْمَسْجِدِ
chapter.eng-name: The Menstruating Woman Hands Over Something From The Masjid
